name: Gym Punchers: Pocket
description:
You can play it in browser or download the .gb file to play in your Game Boy emulator of choice.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

ARROWS = WASD
A BUTTON = J
START = ENTER

HOW TO PLAY:

The turn based fight has 2 turns – Attack “ATTK” and Defense “DEF”

During each turn you can chose between 3 actions. These can be activated using the arrow controls.

ACTIONS DURING ATTK:

LEFT ARROW: HEAL – You regain one heart
UP/DOWN ARROW: KICK – 50% chance to hit
RIGHT ARROW: PUNCH – 50% chance to hit

ACTIONS DURING DEF:

LEFT ARROW: SKIP – skip turn and gain a 100% chance to hit next turn
UP/DOWN ARROW: DODGE – Jump or duck to avoid kick (50%)
RIGHT ARROW : BLOCK – Block the enemy’s punch (50%)

As soon as one fighter lost all hearts the fight is over.
